pr_title: Create indexing operation listener for every index module call

timeline.message: Create indexing operation listener for every index and check for dynamic compliance access

timeline.bodyText: Should we move this to separate method, similar to "isLoggingWriteDiffEnabled" ?
timeline.author: dinusX

timeline.bodyText: Do we want to add this listener to indexModule when it's disabled ?
timeline.author: dinusX

replies.bodyText:
This will be enabled only if dlsFlsAvailable is enabled. Whether compliance will be enabled or not is dynamic hence checking for the condition writeHistoryEnabledForIndex inside the ComplianceIndexingOperationListenerImpl .
Previously compliance is static during node startup so if it was disabled, we were using a no-op listener ComplianceIndexingOperationListener.
replies.author: sujithvm

replies.bodyText:
Now we are adding this listener always even if Audit logging is disable. That will have performance impact.
(even though listener will check internally if need to log compliance event or not) .
Lets run performance bench-marking to understand if there is any impact.
replies.author: hardik-k-shah

replies.bodyText:
Okay. Performance bench-marking can be done.
Are you suggesting any other alternative to listen on indexing events with dynamic configuration?
replies.author: sujithvm

replies.bodyText:
@hardik-k-shah I ran ES rally for index only challenge. I see comparable results and in some runs, this was faster. I believe it would just be hitting few if conditions.

replies.bodyText:
@hardik-k-shah Ran ES rally with challenge append-no-conflicts-index-only. It is mostly comparable (in some runs, I see this to be faster). I believe it would hit ~3-5 small if-conditions not causing a performance impact
<cluster having master plugin>
esrally --pipeline benchmark-only --track=geopoint --challenge append-no-conflicts-index-only --target-host=https://localhost:9200 --client-options="use_ssl:true,basic_auth_user:'admin',basic_auth_password:'admin',verify_certs:false" --revision=current --user-tag="intention:baseline_master_1.8.0.0_run_1"

<cluster having compliance_ciol change plugin>
esrally --pipeline benchmark-only --track=geopoint --challenge append-no-conflicts-index-only --target-host=https://localhost:9200 --client-options="use_ssl:true,basic_auth_user:'admin',basic_auth_password:'admin',verify_certs:false" --revision=current --user-tag="intention:baseline_compliance_ciol_1.8.0.0_run_1"

esrally compare --baseline=025569a1-4be2-419a-8fd1-fe1ad42b2a20 --contender=33de97f0-f140-48e3-a96d-a5763d040532
